home.description: We are a community project for anyone looking for a healthy place to meet other furries, promoting free events and meetups in the fandom.
home.text1: Group aimed at organizing both meetups and art trades in an environment as non-monetized as possible. This way, we try to create a space for those who want to be part of this fandom but, for economic reasons, cannot afford or do not want to spend half their salary to participate.

groups.title: Groups
groups.description: In Furrfree there are different groups you can join to be part of this community.
